Items.Name: Purple Clay
Items.Desc: This clay is very soft and easy to work with.

Items.Name: Black Clay
Items.Desc: This firm clay has a black glossy quality.

Items.Name: Green Clay
Items.Desc: This green clay is firm yet malleable, making it excellent for characters that need to move a lot while keeping their form.

Items.Name: Studio Quality Drafting Table LED Desk
Items.Desc: This advanced drafting table has been adopted by many claymation artists due to it's ability to be pivoted flat and enable attachments for many assessories.

Items.Name: Gold Clay
Items.Desc: This glossy golden clay looks like real gold that you can mold in your hands. It is of medium firmness and very malleable.

Items.Name: Black Clay
Items.Desc: This firm clay has a black glossy quality.
